messages.content: What functionality does the save image plus custom node offer?
This custom node allows saving images in JPEG and WEBP formats with both lossless and lossy compression, including the embedding of metadata for loading workflows.
What is metadata in this context?
Metadata refers to the data used for loading workflows and includes details about the image such as dimensions, colors, and properties.
What are the options available for handling metadata?
An option is available to remove metadata, which can be overridden from the node, and it defaults to the ComfyUI arguments.
How can one install the save image plus custom node?

To install, one must clone the repository into the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes' folder using the command: 'git clone https://github.com/Goktug/comfyui-saveimage-plus' followed by running the installation script.
What formats does the save image plus custom node support for saving images?
The custom node supports saving images in JPEG and WEBP formats.
What types of compression can WebbP format offer?
WEBP format can offer both lossless and lossy compression.
How can one override the metadata removal option?
The metadata removal option can be overridden from the node, deviating from the default ComfyUI arguments.
